name: Growing Shade
description:
Plant seeds and grow trees to create a shaded pathway to your Tent!

Plot:

Biologist Woody Everwood occasionally goes out camping to appreciate nature and explore new places. During his expedition, the weather was really hot, due to global warming, and he needed to return to his campsite after collecting some new fast-growing tree seeds which provide extra shadows and shade from the Sun. 

Objective:

Help Dr. Everwood by planting trees in different directions to create a shaded pathway to reach his campsite.

  • Dr. Everwood can only move to surrounding blocks that have a Shadow from a Tree next to it.
  • Seeds can only be planted on Fertile soil after Watering it.
  • There are a limited amount of seeds, so Trees can be uprooted and replanted in a different place.
  • The Trees can be rotated in any direction.
  • Dr. Everwood can only plant trees adjacent to his position, not diagonal.

Controls:

-> Use a Mouse to move through blocks and plant seeds.

Installation Instructions:

  1. Unzip the file.
  2. Run "Growing Shade.exe" and ENJOY!
